it.unibo.system

Class DbCom

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.system.DbCom

  • public class DbCom
extends java.lang.Object
    db com serves to communicate with the server, mainly deals with creating queries or turn them over to the server, format the data as required and return them. Need USER e PASSWORD per il DB, il PATH DEL DB.
    Since:
    07/feb/2015 14:11:36
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    matteo.mariani11@studio.unibo.it
